markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 175 2.0 **Prerequisites** [ruffian racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=1); [Debilitating Strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=10) --- The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.
  • **Debilitation** The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.
  • **Debilitation** The target becomes clumsy 1.
name: Vicious Debilitations
